summary: GET INSTANT FPS BOOST! Switch the resolution from 100% to 50% and back instantly by clicking the middle button of mouse, and get a massive FPS boost! Hint: this is useful for massive battles... Compatible with DX9 games - not just for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=4][color=orange][b]====================================================================[/b][/color][/size]
[size=7][color=orange][b][url=http://www.hialgo.com/TechnologyCHILL.html]HIALGO CHILL V0.3 is released[/url][/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]
Download it from[url=http://www.hialgo.com/TechnologyCHILL.html#DOWNLOAD_BLOCK] CHILL page on hialgo website[/url]
Post your questions and feedback on[url=http://hialgo.forumchitchat.com/?forum=337835] hialgo CHILL forum[/url]
[/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]====================================================================[/b][/color][/size]
[/center]

[center][color=orange][size=6][b]SURVIVE ANY BATTLE: GET INSTANT FPS BOOST![/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][youtube]X5nWAWEqjvM[/youtube]....[youtube]SH124_5ypsc[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]eUpuMnbP0-0[/youtube]....[youtube]QHp9eVtbhSo[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]q8vDS-ynE9c[/youtube]....[youtube]3TnxCT3uL64[/youtube][/center]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/4383361-1378459419.png[/img]
[color=orange][size=6]Switch the resolution from 100% to 50% and back instantly by clicking the middle button of mouse, and get a massive FPS boost! Hint: this is useful for massive battles... Compatible with DX9 games - not just for Skyrim.[/size][/color]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/4383361-1378459235.png[/img]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/4383361-1378459515.png[/img]
[size=6][color=orange]TO INSTALL:
>> No installation necessary, just run "Injector.exe".
USAGE:
>> Once in game, press F10 to activate. Middle Click to toggle.[/size][/color]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/4383361-1378459573.png[/img]
[size=6][color=orange]Compatible with (all?) DX9 games - not just for Skyrim![/size][/color]

Verified so far (on an AMD Graphics card):
- Skyrim
- FarCry 3
- Dishonored
- Modern Warfare 3
- BorderLands 2
- MassEffect 3
- Batman Arkham City
- Call of Juarez
- Diablo 3
- Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
- Probably all games based on Unreal3 engine will work
- Probably all games based in Unity3D engine will work
- Please post which additional games worked...

Release history:
*************************************************
- Version 0.2 ALPHA
- bugfixes, improved compatibility
- main executable renamed to Injector.exe
- Replaced the logo by resolution indicators
- Still not compatible with ENBSeries.
*************************************************

*************************************************
- Version 0.1 ALPHA - Initial version
- Expect bugs, artifacts and crashes...
- Not tested on NVidia cards (AMD only) - but should work anyway...
- Not compatible with ENBSeries.
*************************************************
author: HiAlgoBoost
